pull.title: travis: Change Mac goal to all deploy
pull.body: Currently, travis only build bitcoin-qt for Mac with make deploy, so  I think that we can add a make step to build cli, daemon, test and bench executables.

events.body: Just a note that this doesn't time out due to the increase in build time: https://travis-ci.org/MarcoFalke/bitcoin/builds/388818711 (travis build with all caches wiped)
Due to travis timeout if there is no cache, so change to another way that just add a new matrix job.
@ken2812221 There was *no* timeout on the mac job, so your previous solution would be fine. I have deferred this to theuni, since I am not fluent in out build system.
Oh. I just saw the Linux job and misidentified it as Mac job. Thanks for clearifying. So change back to original way.

The purpose of "Goal" is that we only build towards that. Unconditionally building all would defeat that purpose.

I think instead, we want to set the mac Goal to ```all deploy```.

events.message: travis: Change Mac goal to all deploy so that travis can build all executables for Mac.

rename.from: travis: Add make step so that travis can build all executables for Mac.
rename.to: travis: Change Mac goal to all deploy

issue.title: Avoid concurrency issue when make multiple target
issue.body:
From #13406, changed travis job target for Mac to `all deploy`, but this could cause a race condition.
Simply add `.NOTPARALLEL` to avoid it.
Related jobs:
https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/391863281
https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/391907335
Close #13469
